title: The Shield
creator_credit: National Society for the Prevention of Blindness and Leo Trachtenberg
brief_description: Presents statements from industrial employees whose eyesight was saved by wearing eye protection, followed by statements from a man who was blinded in an industrial accident. Demoonstrates the typical use of eye protection - shileds, special glasses and shades.
